title: Turrialba Makes, the World Series Takes
sub_head: The small Costa Rica town houses the only factory for major-league baseballs.
body:
Washington
A couple of weeks ago my family and I were invited by the Executive Council on Diplomacy to a baseball game hosted by the Washington diplomatic corps. Although I have a lot to learn about the sport, there is a strong connection between Major League Baseball and my homeland, Costa Rica.
